All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Continent
The Continent class represents a continent in the game map.
Country
The Country class represents a country in the game map.
Deploy
The Deploy class represents a deployment order issued by a player in the Warzone game.
GameEngine
This class is responsible for maintaining the rules for the Warzone game along with generating the flow of gameplay.
GameUtils
Utility class for managing various game-related actions and operations.
Main
This is the main runner class which is the root of the Warzone project.
Main.Phase
An enumeration representing the different phases of the Warzone game.
Map
The Map class represents a game map, which includes continents and countries.
MapFileParser
The MapFileParser class parses a Warzone map file and constructs a map based on its contents.
MapUtils
The MapUtils class provides utility functions to edit and manage the game map.
MapValidator
This class performs validation of map correctness, also after loading and saving any new map the map will be validated automatically.
Order
This is an abstract base class for various orders that can be issued by players in the Warzone game.
Player
Represents a player in the Warzone game, with methods for managing player actions and orders.
